name: Validate_isTrueTest
description: Unit tests for the Validate.isTrue method.

test_cases.name: testIsTrue_withTrueValue
test_cases.description: Tests the Validate.isTrue method with a true value.

test_cases.name: testIsTrue_withFalseValue
test_cases.description: Tests the Validate.isTrue method with a false value, expecting a ValidationException.
